Interface ClientInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CLI, GUI

    public interface ClientInterface

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int[] chooseCoordinates()
      It asks the client to choose the coordinates of a box of his scheme.
      int chooseDice()
      It asks the client the position of a stock's dice.
      int[] chooseFromPath()
      It asks the client to choose a dice from the round path.
      int chooseToolMessages()
      It asks the client for the serial number of the tool card he want to use.
      int chooseValue()
      It asks the client to choose a value to be assigned to the dice.
      void endTurn()
      It prints the "end turn" message.
      void endTurnMessage()
      It prints a message after the scheme is chosen.
      void exit()
      It closes the client.
      java.lang.String handleTurnMenu()
      It prints the game menu choices.
      java.lang.String[] loginMessages()
      It asks the client to insert username and password.
      void loginOkMessage()
      It tells if the login is validated.
      boolean newMatch()
      It prints the end match menù.
      int[] placeDiceMessages()
      It asks the client to choose a dice from the stock and then the placement coordinates.
      void printCarpetFirst(java.lang.String greenCarpetjson, java.lang.String playerjson)
      It prints the game table at the start of the turn.
      int schemeMessages(java.lang.String scheme1, java.lang.String scheme2, java.lang.String scheme3, java.lang.String scheme4, java.lang.String privategoal)
      It prints the private goal of the user and 4 schemes, then asks the client to choose one of them.
      void sendTimer(int i)
      It prints the timer value(Only Gui).
      void showConnDiscPopup(java.lang.String message)
      It prints messages related to connection or disconnection of an user(Gui as a popup,Cli as a println).
      void showError(java.lang.String message)
      It prints errors messages.
      void showMessage(java.lang.String message)
      It prints an info message.
      void showPlacementeError(java.lang.String message)
      It prints only the errors related to bad dice placement.
      void showScore(java.lang.String[] score)
      It prints the score table.

      It prints the instruction of the related toolcard.

      It sets the timerout value.

      It prints the color of the new dice and launches choosevalue.
      int[] tool12Messages()
      It asks first the client to choose a dice from roundpath, then it prints the choice menu of tool 12 than launches or tool23messages if the choice is 1 or tool4messages if the coice is 2.
      int tool1Messages()
      It prints the client the tool1 choice menu and asks him to choose.
      int[] tool23Messages()
      It asks the client to choose the coordinates of the dice to be moved and then the new coordinates of the dice.
      int[] tool4Messages()
      It asks the client the coordinates of 2 dices to be moved and the new coordinates of them.

      It prints the rerolled dice of the tool6 and asks the client to place it.

      It prints the game table after every update.

      • loginMessages

        java.lang.String[] loginMessages()
                          throws java.io.IOException,
                                 java.lang.InterruptedException
        It asks the client to insert username and password.
        Returns:
        an array of Strings with the username and the password.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there is a socket connection error.
        java.lang.InterruptedException

        playerJson - players info json extension.

      • tool23Messages

        int[] tool23Messages()
              throws java.io.IOException,
                     java.lang.InterruptedException
        It asks the client to choose the coordinates of the dice to be moved and then the new coordinates of the dice.
        Returns:
        an integer array with the old and new coordinates of the dice.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there is a socket connection error.
        java.lang.InterruptedException

      • tool4Messages

        int[] tool4Messages()
             throws java.io.IOException,
                    java.lang.InterruptedException
        It asks the client the coordinates of 2 dices to be moved and the new coordinates of them.
        Returns:
        an array with the old and new coordinates of the 2 dices.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there is a socket connection error.
        java.lang.InterruptedException

      • tool12Messages

        int[] tool12Messages()
              throws java.io.IOException,
                     java.lang.InterruptedException
        It asks first the client to choose a dice from roundpath, then it prints the choice menu of tool 12 than launches or tool23messages if the choice is 1 or tool4messages if the coice is 2.
        Returns:
        an integer array with the rounpath dice coordinates plus n coordinates like tool23messages or tool4messages.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there is a socket connection error.
        java.lang.InterruptedException

      • tool6Messages

             throws java.io.IOException,
                    java.lang.InterruptedException
        It prints the rerolled dice of the tool6 and asks the client to place it.
        Parameters:
        dice - in json extension.
        Returns:
        an integer array with the placemente coordinates
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there is a socket connection error.
        java.lang.InterruptedException
